Any good campaign starters for a couple of first-time players and a seasoned DnD player? 
<div id='comment z13guvdyowa0y13hf04cefqzmyrcslwwwps0k'>
  <h4><img src='{{site.baseurl}}//images/avatars/100309716718451042779_photo.jpg'> Charlie Etheridge-Nunn</h4>
      <p><cite>2017-11-29 23:01:16 (edited: 2017-11-29 23:01:16)</cite></p>
        <p>I’ve run the Slave Pit of Drazhu for newbies and trad players alike as their introduction to the system and it went pretty well. It’s a bit more of an adventure than a dungeon starter but gives a lot to springboard off of.<br />Alternatively there are some great Dungeon Starters in this site, most of which I want to use at some point. <a href="http://www.finemessgames.com/DWsupplements/dungeonstarters" data-embed="_" data-attachment-render-hint="1" class="ot-anchor">http://www.finemessgames.com/DWsupplements/dungeonstarters</a></p>
</div>
        

<div id='comment z13guvdyowa0y13hf04cefqzmyrcslwwwps0k'>
  <h4><img src='{{site.baseurl}}//images/avatars/102595580176380683252_photo.jpg'> Jeremy Strandberg</h4>
      <p><cite>2017-11-30 00:10:03 (edited: 2017-11-30 00:10:03)</cite></p>
        <p>Tons! <br /><br />There&#39;s a decent list here.<br /><a href="http://a-dungeon-world.wikia.com/wiki/Dungeon_Starters" data-embed="__AEKdmh0dHBzOi8vdmlnbmV0dGUud2lraWEubm9jb29raWUubmV0L2EtZHVuZ2Vvbi13b3JsZC9pbWFnZXMvNi82NS9EdW5nZW9uX1N0YXJ0ZXJzLnBuZy9yZXZpc2lvbi9sYXRlc3Q_Y2I9MjAxNzA2MzAwMTI2NTQSdmh0dHBzOi8vdmlnbmV0dGUud2lraWEubm9jb29raWUubmV0L2EtZHVuZ2Vvbi13b3JsZC9pbWFnZXMvNi82NS9EdW5nZW9uX1N0YXJ0ZXJzLnBuZy9yZXZpc2lvbi9sYXRlc3Q_Y2I9MjAxNzA2MzAwMTI2NTSaAQMzMDCiAQMyNTb6ETZodHRwOi8vYS1kdW5nZW9uLXdvcmxkLndpa2lhLmNvbS93aWtpL0R1bmdlb25fU3RhcnRlcnM" data-attachment-render-hint="2" class="ot-anchor">http://a-dungeon-world.wikia.com/wiki/Dungeon_Starters</a></p>
</div>
        

<div id='comment z13guvdyowa0y13hf04cefqzmyrcslwwwps0k'>
  <h4><img src='{{site.baseurl}}//images/avatars/102595580176380683252_photo.jpg'> Jeremy Strandberg</h4>
      <p><cite>2017-11-30 00:13:24 (edited: 2017-11-30 00:13:24)</cite></p>
        <p>Also: the Guantlet folks put a contest together recently, looking for DW starters or OSR short adventures.  There&#39;s a treasure trove of good starters here:<br /><br /><a href="https://drive.google.com/open?id=0ByS4_7KbXro_RGxCZHpGakhUTG8" data-embed="_" data-attachment-render-hint="2" class="ot-anchor">https://drive.google.com/open?id=0ByS4_7KbXro_RGxCZHpGakhUTG8</a></p>
</div>
        

<div id='comment z13guvdyowa0y13hf04cefqzmyrcslwwwps0k'>
  <h4><img src='{{site.baseurl}}//images/avatars/112612444960681229385_photo.jpg'> Samuel Aguirre</h4>
      <p><cite>2017-11-30 00:14:34 (edited: 2017-11-30 00:14:34)</cite></p>
        <p>Thanks, I will be starting a campaign in a week or so, just trying to get some ideas now.</p>
</div>
        

<div id='comment z13guvdyowa0y13hf04cefqzmyrcslwwwps0k'>
  <h4><img src='{{site.baseurl}}//images/avatars/102595580176380683252_photo.jpg'> Jeremy Strandberg</h4>
      <p><cite>2017-11-30 00:17:58 (edited: 2017-11-30 00:17:58)</cite></p>
        <p>And three by me, if you&#39;re interested:<br /><br /><b>The Obsidian Forests of Yeng</b> in which you find yourselves fleeing something through a most inhospitable environ<br /><a href="https://drive.google.com/open?id=1q81nDHhnxNjv9YT5FCSmfViTpx-1-ApyEGl32tnVI8U" class="ot-anchor">https://drive.google.com/open?id=1q81nDHhnxNjv9YT5FCSmfViTpx-1-ApyEGl32tnVI8U</a><br /><br /><b>Sailing the Sapphire Seas</b> a nautical campaign starter<br /><a href="https://drive.google.com/open?id=10EQeqX2zXb2ziuAKWFFpgmCDvXZz9J8ZZNg3zHzKYtE" class="ot-anchor">https://drive.google.com/open?id=10EQeqX2zXb2ziuAKWFFpgmCDvXZz9J8ZZNg3zHzKYtE</a><br /><br /><b>Under the Dark of the New Moon</b> an urban adventure starter inspired by some old DC Conan comics<br /><a href="https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B0lFq3ECDQDQeTkxMjd5WnVxMWc" class="ot-anchor">https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B0lFq3ECDQDQeTkxMjd5WnVxMWc</a></p>
</div>
        

<div id='comment z13guvdyowa0y13hf04cefqzmyrcslwwwps0k'>
